events.message: I would like to request a refund for the headphones I bought last week because they stopped working after just two days of use.
The customer's request was identified as a refund issue related to a malfunctioning electronic product.
Assigning the case to the refund specialist team to process the refund request for the faulty headphones.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like a refund for your headphones, and I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and any pictures showing the issue with the headphones to assist with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have also attached pictures of the headphones showing the damage and the issue with the left earcup.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method. Please return the headphones using the prepaid shipping label we will email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the prepaid label and look forward to receiving confirmation once the refund is processed.
The refund process has been initiated, and you should receive a confirmation email shortly. Please send the product back within 14 days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have sent back the headphones and to ask if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
We are closing this case now as the refund was successfully processed and the product returned. Thank you for your patience.
